description: Decimal expansion of Hardy-Littlewood constant for prime quadruples.
references: S. R. Finch, Mathematical Constants, Cambridge, 2003, pp. 84-94.
mathematica: $MaxExtraPrecision = 1500; digits = 105; terms = 1500; P[n_] := PrimeZetaP[n] - 1/2^n - 1/3^n; LR = Join[{0, 0}, LinearRecurrence[{5, -4}, {-12, -60}, terms + 10]]; r[n_Integer] := LR[[n]]; (27/2)* Exp[NSum[ r[n]*P[n-1]/(n-1), {n, 3, terms}, NSumTerms -> terms,WorkingPrecision -> digits + 10]] // RealDigits[#, 10, digits]& // First (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Apr 16 2016 *)
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jun 13 2001
